item.title: CVE-2024-34563|2024-06-06T19:05:15.894Z -- goldaddons -- gold%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in GoldAddons Gold Addons for Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Gold Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 1.2.9.
